messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
Hi Ian, how can I assist you today?
I'm really upset with the quality of the KitKat bars I've been buying recently. They don't taste the same and the texture is off.
I'm sorry to hear that, Ian. We take quality issues very seriously. Could you provide more details about the problem you're experiencing with the KitKat bars?
The chocolate coating seems thinner, and the wafer inside is stale. It's not what I'm used to from KitKat.
I understand your frustration, Ian. This is definitely not the experience we want our customers to have. Could you tell me where and when you purchased these KitKat bars?
I bought them from my local grocery store about a week ago. I've tried three different bars from the same pack, and they all had the same issue.

Thank you for providing that information, Ian. I will forward this to our quality control team for further investigation. In the meantime, we would like to send you a replacement pack of KitKat bars. Can you please provide your address?
Fine. My address is 123 Main Street, Springfield.
Got it. We will send out the replacement pack as soon as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just make sure this doesn't happen again. It's really disappointing.
I understand, Ian. We appreciate your feedback and will do everything we can to ensure it doesn't happen again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
